title: why message can be sent without accepting request in lol
body: Just finished a game with flamers, I left the after game screen and some flamers from my team add me, I knew they are going to flame me so I didn't accept their friend request, unfortunately they can still send me message in coarse language even I didn't accept their friend request. Please check, and if you can, suspend that flamer's account.

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you wish to report a player for harassment that occurs out of game (ie; through pvp.net friends) you'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support.

For anything happening in-game, please use the post-game report function.
